issue.title: [Rust] Move Parquet specific info to Parquet Readme
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4271](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4271). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The arrow readme contains parquet specific info that was copied over from the top level readme, it should be moved to the parquet readme.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4271?focusedCommentId=16745110) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3412
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3412>
